page.title: 13Chalgrove Brass Band
page.content: The Band meets for practice in The John Hampden Hall on Wednesday and Sunday evenings.Instruments in use are:- 8 Cornets 3 Horns 2 Flugels 2 Euphoniums 3 Trombones 3 Bass 1 Percussion 8 Others Our conductor is Anthony Spicer.The oldest player is Syd. Spicer, he is 75 the youngest is 9; we have many young players, almost half the band. Sometimes we play in contests where we can choose our pieces, sometimes we have to play a set programme. We are not very successful in competitions. We play at local fetes for which the band is paid 50 pounds. We go on tour at Easter to Belgium, it is great.
